amendment.description: To address interment schedule availability at cemeteries under the control of the National Cemetery Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3082 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3082 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3082 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3082 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
